Project Structure

Robert will work correctly only on the web server!

The structure of the Robert HTML template:

  • css - all common scripts used on the pages, theme styles included in main.css and blog_page.css files
  • fonts - all fonts used on the pages
  • img - icons and backgrounds for the project
  • svg - svg sprite for the project
  • images - photo images for the project
  • js - all common scripts used on the pages file
  • php - the script for the site forms
Head

GSAP

All scroll animations and slider are built with plugin GSAP v3, you can find documentation here

Change animation settings

Change the value of variables in main.js file.

  • hSpeed - horizontal scrolling speed in percent
  • vSpeed - scrolling speed of vertical blocks
  • scrubPower - time / strength of action of smooth stop after scrolling
  • snapMode - scrolling to block boundaries
  • noiseMode - background noise
